categories: Category:Starships of the resurgent Sith Empire

nodes.text: Imperial Starship 2423T6H3L5 was the official designation of a starship used by the reconstituted Sith Empire during the Galactic War. Piloted by Lieutenant Commander Ina'irolia'kleoni, its transponder codes were stolen by Combo and used by a smuggler captain to board the Imperial treasury ship King's Ransom.
